TitlePage.Subtitle: Universal Groups Acting LocallY
TitlePage.Author:
Khalil Hannouch
khalil.hannouch@newcastle.edu.au https://www.newcastle.edu.au/profile/khalil-hannouch

Stephan Tornier
stephan.tornier@newcastle.edu.au https://www.newcastle.edu.au/profile/stephan-tornier
TitlePage.Abstract: UGALY (Universal Groups Acting LocallY) is a GAP package that provides methods to create, analyse and find local actions of universal groups acting on locally finite regular trees, following Burger-Mozes and Tornier.
